description: The Spring-Spring Fruit allows the user to turn their body parts into springs, granting them the ability to bounce at high speeds and deliver powerful spring-based attacks. The user becomes a Spring Human.

users.circumstances: Bellamy has already consumed the fruit before his first appearance

abilityReveals.description: Bellamy turns his legs into springs and bounces around at high speed, using the momentum to deliver powerful attacks.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Bellamy uses this technique to attack Luffy and Zoro in the Mock Town bar.

abilityReveals.description: The user can transform their limbs into springs for enhanced mobility and attack power.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Demonstrated when Bellamy's legs become springs during his attack.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.description: The spring properties allow for rapid bouncing movement that makes the user difficult to track.
The spring compression and release adds significant force to physical attacks.
